def_en: The members of royal families are sometimes referred to as royalty .
Royalties are payments made to authors and musicians when their work is sold or performed. They usually receive a fixed percentage of the profits from these sales or performances.

def_cn: (发明、创意、财产等的)使用费
def_en: Payments made to someone whose invention, idea, or property is used by a commercial company can be referred to as royalties .
